author: Anonymous Poet
title: When to include termination argument/ are graph problems always genrec?
question:
As I was going through pset 11 I noticed that all the questions were genrec. SO in general, are all graph related questions genrec questions and must we include a termination argument for every graph type problem? 
thanks!
student_answer: If it has genrec in the template, it's a safe bet to include a termination argument.
